Command.Name: octagon
Command.Procedure: to octagon [ :length ] [ make :angle quotient 360 8 repeat 8 [ right :angle forward :length ] ]

Command.Name: hexagon
Command.Procedure: to hexagon [ :length ] [ make :angle quotient 360 6 repeat 6 [ right :angle forward :length ] ]

Command.Name: pentagon
Command.Procedure: to pentagon [ :length ] [ make :angle quotient 360 5 repeat 5 [ right :angle forward :length ] ]
